The '''panorama''' (also known as the '''cubemap'''<ref>{{snap|21w41a|October 13, 2021}}</ref>) is a slowly panning wide-angle view of a ''Minecraft'' world displayed on the [[title screen]] and most other [[menu screen]]s. It is themed after the latest [[named update]] and can be customized with a [[resource pack]].

== Description ==
The panorama is shown as a background in all menu screens that do not cover the entire background. This includes all menu screens in ''[[Java Edition]]'' and in ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' the [[main menu]], [[loading world screen]] (except Realms), pop-up windows, all [[Ore UI]] menus, and the [[Dressing Room]]. Non-Ore UI error screens display a static [[background]] instead.

The panorama moves right in ''Java Edition'' and left in ''Bedrock Edition''.<ref>{{Bug|MCPE-229841|3=Panorama no longer rotates clockwise}}</ref>{{until|be 26.0}}

A separate panorma is shown when [[Vibrant Visuals]] is enabled. The brightness of this panorama is affected by the "Adjust Gamma" setting. Exclusive panoramas are also shown for ''[[Minecraft Preview]]'' with Vibrant Visuals disabled and ''[[Minecraft Education]]''.

In the [[options]], the panorama scrolling can be adjusted with the "Panorama Scroll Speed" [[Accessibility Settings|accessibility setting]] in ''Java Edition'' and the "Screen Animations" video setting in ''Bedrock Edition''. A blur overlay can be adjusted in the options in ''Java Edition''.

The panorama files in ''Java Edition'' are found in the <samp>indexes</samp> directory as multiple square images (<samp>panorama_<0-5>.png</samp>) and are extracted in the same way as sound files, as denoted in [[Tutorial:Sound directory]]. In ''Bedrock Edition'', the regular panorama is stored in the regular [[Resource pack#Internal resource packs|vanilla resource pack]] in {{file|directory|textures/ui|inline=1}}. Each Vibrant Visuals panorama (including discontinued) is stored in the internal resource pack of the respective version as <code>.hdr</code> files.

With [[resource packs]], the vanilla panorama may be overwritten with custom images. Six square (1080x1080) images named <samp>panorama_<0-5>.png</samp> (or <samp>panorama_<0-5>.hdr</samp> for Vibrant Visuals) need to be placed in the {{file|directory|assets/<namespace>/textures/gui|inline=1}}{{Only|je|short=1}}{{verify}}/{{file|directory|textures/ui|inline=1}}{{Only|be|short=1}} directory. The first four panoramas are used horizontally from left to right, <samp>panorama_4</samp> is rendered above <samp>panorama_0</samp> and <samp>panorama_5</samp> is rendered below the first panorama. Custom panoramas reverse the animation in ''Bedrock Edition'' by default (moving right instead of left). Several [[Marketplace]] add-ons and ''Minecraft Education'' events contain custom panoramas.

{{IN|JE}}, this panorama was introduced in [[Java Edition 25w45a|25w45a]], currently used in [[Java Edition 25w41a|25w41a]] onward. {{IN|be}}, this panorama was introduced in [[Bedrock Edition Preview 1.21.130.26|Preview 1.21.130.26]]. A different panorama shows when [[Vibrant Visuals]] is enabled.

The regular panorama was taken in ''Java Edition'' and the Vibrant Visuals panorama was taken in ''Bedrock Edition''. Both panoramas were taken in worlds using the [[World seed|seed]] <code>-6464260789280200050</code> at coordinates <code>X=-409 / Y=63 / Z=-105</code>.<ref>{{ytl|u8G3JR7qSS0|Minecraft 1.21.11 Panorama Found in 14 hours!|Minecraft@Home|November 5, 2025}}</ref> The world spawn of this seed is in a [[desert]] at <code>X=-16 / Y=63 / Z=16</code> and the coordinates <code>X=-409 / Y=63 / Z=-105</code> are located in the same desert biome 411 blocks to the west.

This panorama is exclusively available on {{BE}} and [[Minecraft Education|''Minecraft Education'']] [[Minecraft Preview|Previews]] after [[Bedrock Edition Preview 1.18.20.22|Preview 1.18.20.22]] and [[Minecraft Education Preview 1.21.40.1|Preview 1.21.40.1]], and betas after [[Bedrock Edition Preview 1.21.80.21|Bedrock Edition beta 1.21.80.21]]. It is the only panorama the player could see in Previews and betas when [[Vibrant Visuals]] are turned off.

This panorama was taken on the [[World seed|seed]] <code>2510333169515186510</code> at coordinates <code>X=979 / Y=71 / Z=-11</code>.

Although this panorama is exclusive to ''Bedrock Edition'' and ''Minecraft Education'', it was actually taken in [[Java Edition 1.17.1]], which can be inferred from [[Block colors#Water colors|the color of water]], the way in how clouds fade at high distances, the back side of leaves not rendering, and the side texture of the [[dirt path]].
